pr_title: Misc fixes in adaptive tracker, cluster manager and partition state model

timeline.message:
Misc fixes in adaptive tracker, cluster manager and partition state model

1. make adaptive tracker to support newly added partition/disk/node;
Otherwise, it will throw NPE when handling new resouce.
2. make DynamicClusterChangeHandler gracefully handle invalid string in
InstanceConfig
3. add ERROR -> OFFLINE state transition for resetting partition.
more test cases for histogram NPE issue
more test cases for histogram NPE issue
move helix participant metrics out of partition state model

timeline.author: ankagrawal

timeline.bodyText: For all the metrics related changes in this file, it might be cleaner to update the participantMetrics in finally block.
